message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you based on its value of $10,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it provides, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an exclusive opportunity tailored specifically for you, aiming to maximize the value you receive while ensuring you have the best experience with our product. Please let me know if you're interested in this offer so we can proceed with the details.
